snippet: “Cheerful Insanity” is a repertory production of two confessional plays, “Callous Cad” by Tom X. Chao and “Penetrating the Space” by Kim Katzberg.
lead_paragraph: “Cheerful Insanity” is a repertory production of two confessional plays, “Callous Cad” by Tom X. Chao and “Penetrating the Space” by Kim Katzberg.

headline.main: Support From a Love Sprite and Some Fractured Friends
headline.print_headline: Support From a Love Sprite And Some Fractured Friends
